sentences.sentence: Amid all the job losses of the Great Recession, there is one category of worker that the economic disruption has been good for: nonhumans.
sentences.translation: 在大衰退造成的所有失业中，有一类工作者在经济衰退中是受益的：非人类。

sentences.sentence: One such discovery is that spindle cells occur in nonhumans.
sentences.translation: 其中一个发现是在非人类上有梭形细胞。

sentences.sentence: Many nonhumans, probably most nonhuman, species have it too.
sentences.translation: 很多非人类，可能大多数非人类，物种也会愤怒。
